title: Hour 1: Kevin Dur-mands
description:
Courtney Cronin, Harry Douglas and Brian Windhorst join the show to react to Draymond Green's recent comments on Kevin Durant's trade demand. Next the crew discusses whether Darvin Ham can work with Russell Westbrook and if Donovan Mitchell should want out of Utah. Later Sam Acho joins the crew to debate if College Football is heading in the right direction.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Hour 1: Is Draymond right for defending Kevin Durant's trade demand
